text: Ani ke karanale juna janavarama allahako nama li'i'eko cha timile tyasabata khamdainau, jabaki timro lagi varjita gari'eka sabai janavaraharu eka eka gari varnana garisaki'eko cha. Tara tyasa avastha baheka jaba ki ti kura khanuko nimti badhya bha'ihalchau tara dherai jaso manisaharu bina jani bujhi aphno iccha purtiko lagi manisaharula'i dhamtiraheka chan. Yasama kunai sanka chaina ki jo simabhanda bahira ga'ihalchan, tiniharula'i timro palanakarta ramrari jandacha
